com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype.impl

Class SubTypeValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsontype.impl.SubTypeValidator

  • public class SubTypeValidator
extends Object
    Helper class used to encapsulate rules that determine subtypes that are invalid to use, even with default typing, mostly due to security concerns. Used by BeanDeserializerFacotry
    Since:
    2.8.11

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Set<String> _cfgIllegalClassNames
      Set of class names of types that are never to be deserialized.
      protected static Set<String> DEFAULT_NO_DESER_CLASS_NAMES
      Set of well-known "nasty classes", deserialization of which is considered dangerous and should (and is) prevented by default.
      protected static String PREFIX_STRING 

    • Constructor Summary
